queries.name: Get predictions for mixture
queries.query:
SELECT p.*, pt.name as property_name, cm.name as calculation_method_name
            FROM predictions p
            JOIN property_types pt ON p.property_type_id = pt.id
            JOIN calculation_methods cm ON p.calculation_method_id = cm.id
            WHERE p.mixture_id = 'a1b2c3d4-e5f6-4a5b-9c8d-1a2b3c4d5e6f'
            LIMIT 100

queries.name: Get experiments for mixture
queries.query:
SELECT e.*, pt.name as property_name
            FROM experiments e
            JOIN property_types pt ON e.property_type_id = pt.id
            WHERE e.mixture_id = 'a1b2c3d4-e5f6-4a5b-9c8d-1a2b3c4d5e6f'

queries.name: Compare predictions with experiments
queries.query:
SELECT 
                pt.name as property_name,
                p.numeric_value as predicted_value,
                e.numeric_value as experimental_value,
                ABS(p.numeric_value - e.numeric_value) as absolute_difference,
                (ABS(p.numeric_value - e.numeric_value) / NULLIF(ABS(e.numeric_value), 0)) * 100 as percentage_difference,
                p.confidence as prediction_confidence,
                cm.name as calculation_method
            FROM predictions p
            JOIN experiments e ON p.mixture_id = e.mixture_id AND p.property_type_id = e.property_type_id
            JOIN property_types pt ON p.property_type_id = pt.id
            JOIN calculation_methods cm ON p.calculation_method_id = cm.id
            WHERE p.mixture_id = 'a1b2c3d4-e5f6-4a5b-9c8d-1a2b3c4d5e6f'
            AND (p.property_type_id = '367d0e2f-4d9f-4a76-8b51-b6936ac8ce22' OR '367d0e2f-4d9f-4a76-8b51-b6936ac8ce22' IS NULL)

queries.name: Search molecules by name
queries.query: SELECT * FROM molecule WHERE name ILIKE '%glyc%' LIMIT 100

suggestions.description: Create a GIN index with pg_trgm extension on molecule.name to improve text search performance.
suggestions.sql:
CREATE EXTENSION IF NOT EXISTS pg_trgm;
CREATE INDEX idx_molecule_name_trgm ON molecule USING gin (name gin_trgm_ops);

queries.name: Search mixtures by name
queries.query: SELECT * FROM mixture WHERE name ILIKE '%glyc%' LIMIT 100

suggestions.description: Create a GIN index with pg_trgm extension on mixture.name to improve text search performance.
suggestions.sql:
CREATE EXTENSION IF NOT EXISTS pg_trgm;
CREATE INDEX idx_mixture_name_trgm ON mixture USING gin (name gin_trgm_ops);

queries.name: Get molecules with specific property value range
queries.query:
SELECT m.*, mp.value
            FROM molecule m
            JOIN molecular_property mp ON m.id = mp.molecule_id
            JOIN property_types pt ON mp.property_type_id = pt.id
            WHERE pt.name = 'Molecular Weight'
            AND mp.value BETWEEN -10 AND 10
            LIMIT 100
